clinical_study.brief_title: MRI Study of BAY 43-9006 in Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: Dynamic-Contrast Enhanced MRI Pharmacodynamic Study of BAY 43-9006 in Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine maximum tumor shrinkage, time to progression, survival, drug concentration, and degree of skin toxicity.

primary_outcome.measure: To determine whether a new experimental MRI technique called "Dynamic Contrast Enhanced MRI" (DCE-MRI) can determine the best dose of sorafenib

secondary_outcome.measure: To predict which patients are most likely to experience tumor shrinkage.
